sourcesContent:
It seems like the issue might be related to the fixed width of the side navigation (w-60) and the fixed width of the header (w-screen). If the sum of these fixed widths is equal to or greater than the screen width, it might cause elements to overflow or be hidden. Here's an adjusted version where I removed the fixed width from the header, allowing it to take up the remaining space in the screen: html Copy code
